Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
This episode provides an overview of Copilot in SSMA for Oracle, showcasing how AI improves code conversion accuracy, reduces manual effort, and guides users through complex migration blockers. It also walks through available authentication methods and offers a glimpse into future roadmap investments.
